summary: This document is a HUD Settlement Statement detailing the transaction involving the sale of a property located at 338 East Washington Road, Bradford, NH. It includes signatures from the buyer, seller, and settlement agent, along with financial details of the transaction, including amounts due and settlement charges.

persons.name: Jeffrey W. Roberts
persons.context: Jeffrey W. Roberts is identified as the manager of Granite Reality LLC, the buyer in the transaction.

persons.name: Richard Yospin
persons.context: Richard Yospin is the trustee of the Richard Yospin Family Trust, the seller of the property.

persons.name: Rebecca Russo
persons.context: Rebecca Russo is identified as the preparer of the settlement statement from Hudkins Law PLLC.

connections.description: Richard Yospin, as trustee of the Richard Yospin Family Trust, sold the property to Granite Reality LLC.
Jeffrey W. Roberts, as the manager of Granite Reality LLC, engaged in a business transaction with Richard Yospin for the purchase of the property.
Rebecca Russo prepared the settlement statement for Richard Yospin's transaction.

events.title: Property Sale Settlement
events.description: The settlement for the sale of the property located at 338 East Washington Road, Bradford, NH was completed.

keyFacts: The property was sold for a contract sales price of $1,070,750.
Settlement charges to the buyer totaled $11,863.35.
Richard Yospin is the trustee of the Richard Yospin Family Trust, which sold the property.
The settlement date and disbursement date for the transaction was December 13, 2019.
The document includes a certification of non-foreign status for the seller.
